div.p: Personally I think it’s connections I really do reckon it’s who you know not what you know; I had an interview for a camera shop,
I thought I had it, I’d worked there previously, went to the interview shirt, tie, suit, looked sharp, I ain’t gonna lie
but I had the interview they asked me some questions “What would you do...?” “How would you...?” and even some of the
questions that he asked me I didn’t answer correctly and I guess with like a job interview the pressure is obviously mounting on you
and I’m not very good at that but I was good at my job but they didn’t hire me
